sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-data-table-virtual
      :headers="headers"
      :items="items"
      height="800"
      item-value="name"
    >
      <template v-slot:top>
        <v-toolbar flat>
          <v-toolbar-title>Parts Change over matrix</v-toolbar-title>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="primary" @click="exportExcel">Export to Excel</v-btn>
          <v-container>
            <v-btn color="primary" @click="triggerFileInput"
              >Import from Excel</v-btn
            >
            <input
              type="file"
              ref="fileInput"
              @change="handleFileUpload"
              style="display: none"
            />
          </v-container>
        </v-toolbar>
      </template>
    </v-data-table-virtual>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headers: [
        { title: "Part No", key: "part_no" },
        { title: "TG11111", key: "tg11111" },
        { title: "TG22222", key: "tg22222" },
        { title: "TG33333", key: "tg33333" },
        { title: "TG44444", key: "tg44444" },
        { title: "TG55555", key: "tg55555" },
        { title: "TG66666", key: "tg66666" },
      ],
      items: [
        {
          part_no: "TG11111",
          tg11111: "",
          tg22222: "34",
          tg33333: "2",
          tg44444: "3",
          tg55555: "4",
          tg66666: "5",
        },
        {
          part_no: "TG22222",
          tg11111: "1",
          tg22222: "2",
          tg33333: "3",
          tg44444: "4",
          tg55555: "5",
          tg66666: "6",
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    triggerFileInput() {
      this.$refs.fileInput.click();
    },
    async handleFileUpload(event) {
      const file = event.target.files[0];
      if (!file) return;
      let formData = new FormData();
      formData.append("file", file);
      const response = await axios.post(
        "http://localhost:8000/upload/",
        formData
      );
      this.items = response.data;
    },
    async exportExcel() {
      const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/export/");
      const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = url;
      link.setAttribute("download", "parts.xlsx");
      document.body.appendChild(link);
      link.click();
    },
  },
};
</script>
